values.description:
Brighton & Hove City Council  is a unitary authority and city on the south coast of England. It is England's most vibrant and cultural seaside city.

It was formed as a unitary authority area on 1 April 1997 by the merger of the East Sussex districts of Brighton and Hove. It immediately applied for and was granted borough status. In 2000 it was awarded city status together with two other UK towns, to mark the Millennium. 

Brighton and Hove is not part of the non-metropolitan county of East Sussex, but it is still part of the ceremonial county of East Sussex.
values.name: Brighton & Hove City Council
Brighton and Hove Psychotherapy
values.description:
Brighton and Hove Psychotherapy is comprised of three experienced clinicians offering a range of counselling, psychotherapy and psychological services, in central Hove. 

We offer short-term and open-ended counselling, psychotherapy for individuals and couples and clinical supervision. We offer a choice of therapists with varying experience and specialisms. 

We are fully insured and registered as either accredited members of the BACP or UKCP. We are also registered with the major private healthcare providers to offer counselling and/or psychotherapy. 

Our consulting rooms comprise the third floor of a beautiful period building, centrally located on The Drive in Hove. Our central, but discreet location offers quiet rooms furnished to a high standard. We also offer our rooms to other practitioners who require therapy room rental in Brighton & Hove area.

A free job listing board for Brighton and Hove in East Sussex, offering free recruitment advertising for employers and free local job alerts for job seekers. 

For people seeking jobs in Brighton and Hove, or the surrounding towns and villages in Sussex, the website offers a free account management area for keeping track of applications, uploading CVs for local employers to view, adding jobs as 'favourites' and organising job alert settings. 

For employers seeking to recruit candidates for positions based near Brighton and Hove, the website offers both free and low cost recruitment advertising solutions. In addition to being able to post jobs free of charge for 30 days, employers can upgrade from as little as £20. Upgrades offer greater exposure and response. 

Whether you're a job seeker or an employer, Jobs in Brighton and Hove has the tools and the options to help connect the right people to the right job.
values.name: Jobs in Brighton and Hove

values.description:
A comprehensive, up-to-date and free on-line resource for parents living in and visiting Brighton, listing everything that is child friendly in Brighton. It includes what’s on for children in Brighton and Hove, things to do, events and activities for children, places to visit, attractions, and listings of groups, clubs and classes such as parent and baby groups, music groups, swimming lessons, ballet, dance and drama classes, arts and crafts classes. From indoor activities such as soft play centres, pottery painting and cinema, to outdoor activities such as farms, zoos, playgrounds and beaches, it provides an invaluable resource for parents looking for ideas for things to do with their children in Brighton and Hove. 

The website also provides listings of child friendly restaurants, cafes, pubs and hotels with details on facilities for children. The website is free to use, and free to be listed on. It is updated on a daily basis.

values: Activities and events for families and children in Brighton and Hove
Child friendly restaurants, cafes and pubs in Brighton and Hove

values.name: Child Friendly Brighton and Hove

values.description:
Ten Hove Advice & Support heeft jarenlange ervaring met het outsourcen van werkzaamheden bij gerenommeerde en geauditeerde bedrijven in binnen- en buitenland. Vanwege het grote netwerk van Ten Hove in binnen- en buitenland en het uitvoeren van kwaliteitscontroles kunnen wij u een kwalitatief goed en goedkoop product bieden. Wij vertegenwoordigen meerdere bedrijven in binnen- en buitenland. Desgewenst brengen wij u in contact met één van onze leveranciers, wanneer u liever direct zaken doet zonder onze assistentie!

De zorg om kwaliteit en tijdige leveringen, wordt u uit handen genomen door Ten Hove Advice & Support, voor een zeer scherpe prijs.
values.name: Ten Hove Advice & Support B.V

values.description:
The Brighton & Hove Food Partnership is working for a healthier, more sustainable food system for the city. We believe all residents should be able to enjoy food that is good for health, respects environmental limits and supports a vibrant farming and food economy. We drive forward progress on the city's food strategy ‘Spade to Spoon: Digging Deeper’, campaign on local and national food issues and deliver a range of community-based cookery, nutrition and growing projects.

We undertake lobbying work and provide training and information to achieve:
- better access to affordable fresh, seasonal food
- more locally produced food
- more opportunities to learn to cook and grow food
- a better understanding of the links between food and health
- a better understanding of where food comes from.

We are a not-for-profit, membership body that brings together community organisations, statutory services, local businesses and individual residents. Membership is free and open to anyone who lives or works in Brighton & Hove and wants to support our work. Members receive a monthly email update and our quarterly printed newsletter as well as the chance to come to member events.
values.name: Brighton & Hove Food Partnership

values.description: Home to Tony Bowall, Award Winning Hove Fine Art Photographer based in his studio in Third Avenue, Hove. Tony's work can be seen in Bellis Gallery, Brighton, Lulu & Hitch, Hove, the Brighton Bandstand Cafe and he has a permanent exhibition of large works in Pizza Express, Church Road, Hove.
values.name: Tony Bowall Photography
Hove Hair Clinic
values.description:
Hove Hair clinic tackles the hair and scalp problems that are making the news today, from Male/female pattern baldness, alopecia (hair loss), to dandruff, psoriasis, seborrhoea (greasy) conditions and many more.

We take pride in giving YOU the knowledge, products and support to understand, treat and take control of your hair loss or scalp condition. We treat each client individually finding the correct combination of products to suit your hair and scalp.

Brighton & Hove Training Services provides a range of services to trainers, small businesses, charities and social enterprises throughout Sussex.

With fifteen years of experience across the private, public and third sectors, we can tailor all of our services to meet your needs.

With a flexible pricing structure designed to be accessible to people from all backgrounds, not only will our services save you valuable time and resources, but they will save you money too.
values.name: Brighton & Hove Training Services
Brighton & Hove Energy Services Company
values.description: BHESCO is a new community owned energy services company created to help residents of Brighton & Hove (and Sussex) reduce their exposure to rising energy prices. We are a not for profit, social enterprise helping people take more control over their energy supply. Offering a three tiered service, we act as a bulk buying club for energy and re-invest a significant part of the profits earned in retrofitting properties to reduce energy bills even further as well as installing renewable energy micro-generation, all designed to buffer the impacts of wholesale fuel price hikes on our customers.

Since 1993 BHIMS has worked with residents, organisations and businesses across Brighton and Hove to promote and deliver mediation services and build stronger more cohesive local communities. We develop and share conflict resolution and communication tools to resolve current problems and reduce future conflicts. We achieve this by training locally based volunteers in the skills they need to mediate conflict within our communities, working with families, neighbours, groups and organisations to find realistic solutions to problems that are acceptable to all involved.
values.name: Brighton & Hove Independent Mediation

values.description:

values.name: Pride Brighton & Hove CIC

values.description:
kirk & hove er en lille konsulentvirksomhed som rådgiver, faciliterer og vejleder bestyrelser og grupper i visionsprocesser, gennem forandrings faser  eller konflikthåndtering.

Vi henvender os til alle, som ønsker, at gøre brug af vores tilgang og vores kompetencer.

Vores primær målgrupper er menighedsråd, kirker og frivillige organisationer, fordi vi har mere erfaring og større viden om de områder.

Vi har et helhedssyn på det enkelte menneske, de nære relationer, organisationer og samfund som er funderet i personalisme. Med andre ord tror vi på at mennesket i bund og grund er et relationelt væsen og det er ved at styrke og forbedre relationerne mennesker imellem at vi opnår det bedste resultat som menneske, i de nære relationer, i organisationer og i samfundet som sådan. Vi tror på at man får den bedste kirke og den bedste organisation, hvis de mennesker driver den har det godt med sine kolleger og får lov til at drømme og realisere dem. Det vil derfor altid være vores ambition at arbejde i retning af et styrket samarbejde hvor kirken eller organisationen er samlet om et fælles projekt, hvor alle er med.
values.name: kirk og hove
